location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, on the negotiations to conclude a treaty with the Joasimese [Qasimi] Chief, on the basis of that negotiated with Captain Seton in 1806.
